verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Lest I forget Gethsemane;
Lest I forget Thine agony;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lest I forget Thy love for me,
Lead me to Calvary.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Lest I forget
Thy thorn-crowned brow,
Lead me to Calvary.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Angels in robes of light arrayed
Guarded Thee whilst
Thou slept.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let me like Mary throâ€™ the gloom,
Come with a gift to Thee;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Show to me now
the empty tomb,
Lead me to Calvary.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
May I be willing, Lord to bear
Daily my cross for Thee;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Even Thy cup of grief to share,
Thou hast borne all for me.
